doc:
Jessie Burton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jessie_Burton 0 Jessica Kathryn Burton (born 17 August 1982) is an English author and actress. As of 2018, she has published three novels, The Miniaturist, The Muse and The Restless Girls. The Muse has been published in 36 languages. Both were Sunday Times no.1 bestsellers, New York Times bestsellers, and Radio 4's Books At Bedtime. Her short stories have been published in Harpers Bazaar US and Stylist. Burton is also a non-fiction writer. Her essays have been published in The Wall Street Journal, The Independent, Vogue, Elle, Red, Grazia, Lonely Planet Traveller and The Spectator. Jessica_Kathryn_Burton ( born 17_August_1982 ) is an_English_author_and_actress . As of 2018 , she has_published three_novels , The_Miniaturist , The_Muse and The_Restless_Girls . The_Muse has_been_published in 36_languages . Both were Sunday_Times_no._1_bestsellers , New_York_Times_bestsellers , and Radio_4 's_Books At Bedtime . Her_short_stories have_been_published in Harpers_Bazaar_US_and_Stylist . Burton is also a_non-fiction_writer . Her_essays have_been_published in The_Wall_Street_Journal , The_Independent_,_Vogue_,_Elle_,_Red_,_Grazia_,_Lonely_Planet_Traveller and The_Spectator .
